title: The Incognium Runeterra?
body:
"The Incognium Runeterra was made to be able to locate anyone in Runeterra, but it's creator was mysteriously killed before it could be finished."

Will this be explored? Saw something like this in the "Did You Know" pop ups. I don't recall this being explored in the lore.

replies.body:
I am interested in it as well.
It would be so awesome to get a champion, who is related to that hextech device one way or another.

I would love to have a champion from Piltover, fulfilling the trope of the "hyper intelligent analyst".
Someone like Kashiwagi Rein from Darwin's Game or Shionji Yuuko from Kamisama no Memochou.

This definitely has to lead to something.... a machine as interesting as that can't just be an anecdote for eternity. I want to read about it more, I want stories of someone at least trying to use it....
"Champions of Interest" coming this fall

> [{quoted}](name=SKShish Renzie,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6zhEtLtW,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-08-22T13:40:51.119+0000)
>
> "Champions of Interest" coming this fall

I loved Person of Interest _so much_.  Especially season 2.  I've never been on the edge of my seat for the wellbeing of such a... unique... character before.  And the foreshadowing - so good.
https://dawngate.gamepedia.com/media/dawngate.gamepedia.com/3/37/Ronan_Avatar.png?version=f58e5e67e82d878854de62aeea608f8b Confirmed!?
*cries in Dawngate*
Name checks out.
http://68.media.tumblr.com/825e1a5a0f25c4018541f19beed54591/tumblr_nad0kaj1dl1rro06so2_500.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/jdetm5h.png

Guys. Don't even start. It so hard to see it. Dawngate was really _really_ good. And had some really good charaters. In some things League could even took some things.

I really loved the idea of items be like "Courage", "Wrath" and etc. The idea of items not be actual items, but "sides" of personality It was really cool and suited champions perfectly. It's always was my dream to have this in League too., I still to this point bothers me a lot - why Ryze need some magical hat, why X champion use X item when they have their own item ingame, why ADC use Infinity Edge and not "Bloodlust" for example. I mean goddamn, it's a sword and they are Ranged!

Mines with workers was also pretty great idea.

And some characters are pretty 10 out of 10. Renzo's personality, Support that can embody their ADC, ADC that has two arrows storred and if he strike 2 times and then does a little pause he does more DPS. Blind Otter Justice Cowboy.

And _many_ more things..

Eh, Dawngate were super good game

My favorite part of Dawngate is if you lost lane, there was still something to do during the laning phase in the Jungle Well things. Enemy wrecking you? Steal their well thing and boost your income while decreasing theirs. Such a great mechanic.

Also, Renzo was the bomb. I dare say it, but I would say he even 1-Ups Braum in buff dude with mustache with a heart, mainly because he had much more lore with him and he had moments like the ones above.

Also, Tombstone Skull Dude as I like to call him. 10/10, best villain voice

Best post-game Honor system too. This guy be cool? Give him bonus IP (forgot what it was called). Essentially half of the game's source of income was that system too so if you weren't nice in-game, too bad, you're broke.
_Oh, right in the feels_
Such an amazing show, I love Harold and everyone. Season 5 was just too much ;-;

....
You just gave me an idea...

Hyper intelligent female analyst from Piltover.... using that machine to peep a well known Sheriff in her free time.

Yeah, I mean, imagine the implications. Where is Swain? Bam. There he is. Where is Talon? Bam. There he is. Where is Gangplank? Boom. He's right there! Where is Ryze? BANG POW! RIGHT THERE GETTING ~~REWORKED~~ HIS WORLD RUNES!
But where's Teemo? Well, turns out he's actually behind you right now
I actually created a custom champion who is somewhat of relevance to the Incognium Runeterra (His ult) ! If you are interested I can show you. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Is this actually new or a relic/old tip from the old days?
It should be new lore since it's part of the loading screen tip.
I think the device was mentioned somewhere in the lore that we got from the Piltover update.
Feels new because there is a picture of the machine on the new Piltover page.
